DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate efficacy treatment base Movement System Impairment base classification ( MSI ) model patient chronic non-specific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Movement System Impairment Based Classification Versus General Exercise Chronic Non-specific Low Back Pain : Randomised Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The subject recruit orthopedic outpatient clinic well community . The examiner screen eligibility subject base eligibility criterion . All eligible subject receive information study sign inform consent form participate study . The examiner collect baseline data prior randomisation . This examiner blind patient ' allocation treatment group . The subject randomly allocate one two group ( treatment base MSI model general exercise ) use computer-generated randomisation schedule conduct study researcher involve patient assessment outcomes . Participant allocation keep seal opaque envelope use random numerical sequence . The examiner , responsible treatment open envelope front patient communicate treatment group part . The clinical outcome study assess , treatment ( 2 month ) 4 6 month randomisation . Descriptive analysis do check data normality . The between-group comparison obtain mean effect treatment conduct mean interaction term ( group versus time interaction ) use Linear Mixed Models . All data give statistician perform statistical analysis cod form . The statistical analysis do accord principle intention treat . The SPSS 19 SigmaPlot 10 use analysis .
DOC.criteria: Subjects gender 18 65 year age chronic nonspecific LBP ( pain 3 month ) pain intensity least 3 point measure 010 point pain numerical rating scale Subjects must able stand walk independently Subjects must able read Portuguese Subjects contraindication physical exercise accord guideline American College Sports Medicine Subjects severe depression ( measure depression , anxiety stress scale DASS ) Subjects serious spinal pathology ( fracture , tumor , inflammatory pathology ankylose spondylitis ) , nerve root compromise ( disc herniation spondylolisthesis neurological compromise , spinal stenosis , others ) , serious cardiorespiratory disease , previous back surgery pregnancy . Subjects classify five category Movement System Impairment model upon initial assessment
